mapper.sql: user_id AS userId, password AS password, name AS username, email AS email, birthDate AS birthDate, chronoType AS isMorningPerson
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (user_id, password, name, email, birthDate, chronoType) VALUES (#{userId}, #{password}, #{username}, #{email}, #{birthDate}, #{isMorningPerson})
mapper.select: SELECT FROM USERS ORDER BY user_id
